text: The 2006 All Thailand Golf Tour was the eighth season of the All Thailand Golf Tour, the main professional golf tour in Thailand since it was established in 1999. ==Tournament results== The table below shows the 2006 schedule. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%" !Date !! Tournament !! Location !! Prize money men (฿) !! Prize money women (฿) !! Men's winner !! Women's winner |- | 15 Jan || Singha Masters || Santiburi Country Club Chiang Rai || align=right|2,000,000 || align=center|– || Boonchu Ruangkit || align=center|– |- | 1 Apr || Singha Pattaya Open || Burapha Golf Club (C-D) || align=right|1,000,000 || align=right|100,000 || Prom Meesawat || Pornanong Phatlum |- | 16 Jul || Chevrolet Championship || Burapha Golf Club (B-A) || align=right|1,000,000 || align=center|– || Thammanoon Sriroj || align=center|– |- | 22 Dec || Singha E-San Open || Victory Park Golf & Country Club || align=right|1,000,000 || align=right|100,000 || Boonchu Ruangkit || Pornanong Phatlum |} ==References== Category:All Thailand Golf Tour All Thailand Golf Tour
title: 2006 All Thailand Golf Tour
